name: romm
description: ROMM is a self-hosted ROM manager for emulators, allowing users to manage and browse ROM libraries via a responsive web UI. It supports tagging, metadata, and organizing by platform.
features: ROM organization: Manage game ROMs organized by platform with automatic sorting.
Metadata scraping: Fetch game titles, descriptions, and artwork from online databases.
Platform support: Handle ROMs from dozens of retro gaming systems in one library.
Web interface: Browse your collection through a modern, responsive web UI.
Search and filter: Find games quickly by title, platform, or custom tags.
Tag system: Add custom tags to games for personalized organization.
Cover art display: View game box art and screenshots in grid or list layouts.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for family members with individual collections.
File management: Upload, delete, or move ROMs through the web interface.
Duplicate detection: Identify and manage duplicate ROMs across your library.
Statistics dashboard: View collection size and breakdown by platform.
Mobile responsive: Access and browse your ROM library from any device.
